Message:
That’s what I learned
throught this journey.

The Curses encroached
upon the land, overrunning it
with creatures I’ve never
seen before.

After experiencing pain,
sadness, the loss of loved ones,

despair that plunged their
worlds into darkness...
bright memories of a loved one—

everyone had a gentle light
shining through the despair
in their hearts.

That’s right.
The world hasn’t been
destroyed just yet.

As long as someone keeps
another close to their heart,
that light will never die!

This world can’t help but
tremble as it stands on
its last legs,

and that’s why
it can’t help but shine.

The waning flame inside
of me began burning
bright red once more.
